meanings.definition: Not released from a duty or obligation.
meanings.sent1: The undischarged task weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent2: She felt undischarged responsibility towards her family.
meanings.sent3: The undischarged promise to help her friend made her feel guilty.
meanings.sent4: His undischarged commitment to volunteer at the shelter kept him busy.
meanings.sent5: The undischarged duty to protect his siblings motivated him to work hard.

meanings.definition: Not having been released from a hospital or other institution.
meanings.sent1: The undischarged patient awaited further treatment.
meanings.sent2: She visited her undischarged friend in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The undischarged visitor brought flowers to cheer up the patient.
meanings.sent4: The undischarged individual in the hospital room seemed hopeful.
meanings.sent5: The undischarged person in the ward received visitors with a smile.

meanings.definition: Not having released a discharge of electricity.
meanings.sent1: The undischarged capacitor held potential energy.
meanings.sent2: The undischarged battery needed to be charged.
meanings.sent3: The undischarged wire caused a short circuit in the circuit.
meanings.sent4: The undischarged device failed to power on.
meanings.sent5: The undischarged outlet posed a safety risk in the room.
